channel.title: chlorophyll content on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in chlorophyll content on funPlantGenes

item.title: AcHZP45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcHZP45 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcHZP45 is a repressor of chlorophyll biosynthesis and activator of chlorophyll degradation in kiwifruit.

item.title: BnGLK1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g00410D Gene Symbol: BnGLK1a Gene Name: Golden2-like 1a Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A Golden2-like transcription factor, BnGLK1a, improves chloroplast development, photosynthesis, and seed weight in rapeseed.

item.title: BnGRF2a1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2a1 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.title: BnGRF2a2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnGRF2a2 Gene Name: growth-regulating factor 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnGRF2 gene (GRF2-like gene from Brassica napus) enhances seed oil production through regulating cell number and plant photosynthesis.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA00g77830 Gene Symbol: CcLOL1 Gene Name: LSD ONE LIKE1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: CcLOL1, CaGLK2 and CcAPRR2 are highly diverged and are associated with immature fruit color variation in C.

item.title: Gh4CL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gh4CL7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Gh4CL7-silencing cotton plants showed more sensitive to drought stress, probably due to decreased relative water content (RWC), chlorophyll content and antioxidative enzyme activity, increased stomatal aperture, and the contents of malondialdehyde (MDA) and hydrogen peroxide (H2O2).

item.title: GhWRKY27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY27 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 27 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhWRKY27, was isolated and characterized.

item.title: GmERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G016500 Gene Symbol: GmERF75 Gene Name: Ethylene-responsive factor gene 75 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The ABA-induced soybean ERF transcription factor gene GmERF75 plays a role in enhancing osmotic stress tolerance in Arabidopsis and soybean.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma19g38100 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3a Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: PdGNC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G229200 Gene Symbol: PdGNC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The GATA transcription factor GNC (PdGNC) plays an important role in photosynthesis and growth in poplar.

item.title: PoCAB151
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0026374 Gene Symbol: PoCAB151 Gene Name: chlorophyll a/b-binding 151 Genome: Species: Paeonia ostii Functional Descriptions: A homologous system indicated that drought treatment increased PoCAB151 promoter activity.

item.title: PoWRKY71
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0031821 Gene Symbol: PoWRKY71 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 71 Genome: Species: Paeonia ostii Functional Descriptions: PoWRKY71 is involved in Paeonia ostii resistance to drought stress by directly regulating light-harvesting chlorophyll a/b-binding 151 gene.

item.title: SbSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSOS1 Gene Name: salt overly sensitive 1 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: The SbSOS1 gene from the extreme halophyte Salicornia brachiata enhances Na+loading in xylem and confers salt tolerance in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SlDDB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlDDB1 Gene Name: DAMAGED DNA BINDING PROTEIN 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlDDB1 seedlings exhibited delayed growth and smaller cell size, greater chloroplast density, smaller chloroplasts and higher concentration of chlorophyll.

item.title: SlGRAS9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g036170 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS9 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 9 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The SlGRAS9-SlZHD17 transcriptional cascade regulates chlorophyll and carbohydrate metabolism contributing to fruit quality traits in tomato.
